name: DEQMCriteriaReferenceExtension
title: DEQM Criteria Reference Extension
description: Identifies which measure criteria (i.e. population, stratifier, or supplementalData) was responsible for the inclusion of the evaluatedResource or supplementalData on which it appears.

element.definition: Reference a measure criteria by referencing their unique id specified in a Measure resource (`Measure.group.population.id`, `Measure.group.stratifier.id,` or `Measure.supplementalData.id`).

element.short: This id SHOULD reference population, stratifier, or supplementalData criteria id in a Measure resource.
